name: Noah Blast - Fun Bible Match3 Puzzle
name_original: Noah Blast - Fun Bible Match3 Puzzle
description:
The ultimate matching bible puzzle game with unique gameplay! It's Noah Blast time! An amazing adventure is waiting for you.
Features:
----------
+ Fun, cute and high quality animations
+ 300 Levels
+ Your children will be glued to this classic Bible story
+ Beautiful levels


Witness the last days of a world so wicked that its own Creator must cleanse it with a flood.
A world where only one man, Noah, remains faithful to God.
And where the future of all mankind will depend on one man's obedience.
Will you join the adventures of Noah as he obeys God's command to build an ark of dry land?
